pages.text: Is He [not best] Who begins creation and then repeats it, and Who provides for you from the heaven and the earth? Is there a god with God? Say, "Show me your evidence, if you are truthful
Say, "None in the heavens and earth knows what lies beyond our senses except God, and they do not know when they will be resurrected
Rather, their knowledge cannot comprehend the Hereafter. They are in doubt about it; they are in fact blind to it
So the unbelievers say, "When we and our fathers become dust, will we then be brought out of the graves
We and our forefathers have been promised this before. This is only a legend of an ancient people
Say, "Travel around the earth and observe the fate of those who are guilty of forcing others to reject God's messages
[Prophet,] do not grieve over them or be distressed by what they conspire
They say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you are truthful
Say, "Perhaps some of what you seem eager for is closer than you think
Verily your Lord is bountiful to people, but most of them do not show gratitude
Certainly your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they declare
for there is nothing [so] hidden in heaven and earth that it is not in a clear record
This Revelation [The Qur'an] explains to the Children of Israel most of what they differ about
